text: 12.14: Dan 7.25; 12.7; VB 12.6; 17.3Mbe maaŋ muuŋgip baŋga bakɨme vhɨganin mba mbiga sararim, ana gegap, wo ŋaneŋ gumgi ki fhu ŋanen ŋgɨrga. Ana ŋgɨgɨp, mba kuruga thav, samra kɨrga. Ana mba ŋanen kɨrga, mbe tuituigip ana ganɨv, mban ana nɨɨŋv kɨrim, mpari mpuveni khegntɨrive fɨgeŋ phorgɨ vhɨzgirga.
